CARDINAL . The provisions concerning the disqualification of judges are contained in LAW , section CARDINAL , of LAW . At the relevant time the said provision was worded as follows :

If the judge knows that such grounds exist in his regard , even though the parties are not aware of the same , the judge shall stand down of his own accord . ”
